message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today.  I think it would be perfect for your needs. Given its value, I'm initially offering it at $10,000.
Alice,  $10,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product but I can't go over $8,500.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $10,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $9,200 to make this deal happen.
Alice, I'm getting closer to your price, but I'm still not there yet.  I'm willing to go to $8,800.  This is the highest I can go, let's make this happen!
